content: the highline wristlet crochet keychain is an easy fun and fast crochet project for a practical accessory that s so on trend - you ll be making it on repeat the pattern includes options for 1 2 or 3 colors with or without the option to add a leather tag for attaching the swivel hook hardware for an experienced crocheter the basic solid color version can be worked up in about 15 minutes making these a great last-minute gift or profitable item for market inventory prep at only 10 yds per keychain these are fabulous for yarn scraps and you can use any brand of worsted 4 wt cotton yarn but i recommend lion brand s 24/7 cotton because it has a pretty sheen and a very tight twist making them less prone to snagging wecrochet s dishie is another good option i have even made some in velvet yarn too - they are soft and squishy no matter what you choose they ll turn out great put your imagination to work with color combinations think about school or sports team colors holidays wedding colors the possibilities are endless you can even personalize them with custom leather tags **level** easy - beginner **size** wristlet without leather attachment is 9 5 around x 1 inch wide **materials** worsted 4 wt 100% cotton shown in lion brand yarns 24/7 cotton 186yds/3 5oz/170m/100g in amber ecru bay leaf & jade approximate amount 10-11 yds/5 5-6 g crochet hook g6 - 4 00 mm yarn needles tape measure & scissors standard version swivel hook with 1/2-inch ring leather wrapped version swivel hook with 1 inch ring 2 5 x 1 inch leather tag and leather hole punch tool or awl i would love to connect with you on social media instagram https //www instagram com/alpenglowbasin facebook https //www facebook com/alpenglowbasin pinterest https //www pinterest com/alpenglowbasin/boards youtube https //www youtub com/channel/uclyjz6a7siwfytkhhezgiza i love to see your ravelry projects and reviews and also your social media posts please tag me @alpenglowbasin or use #alpenglowbasin when posting i can t wait to see ©copyright 2021 corri schmidt reproduction of this pattern is prohibited you may sell items made from this pattern please credit alpenglow basin fiber arts on the tag or a link in your item description to @alpenglowbasin and #alpenglowbasin thank you
